title: Medallion, 19th–early 20th century
description: Slightly oval medallion filled by a light blue crane with out-stretched wings holding a flower or fungus in its beak. Bird superimposed on gold scrolls (clouds) on a black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, 19th–early 20th century.
19th–early 20th century. Medium: silk
Technique: painted. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-492.
